main event: On June 6, 1966, two civilian security officers observed a bright, oval-shaped light in the sky while on patrol in Castle Rock, Colorado.
interesting points: The light was reported to be approximately 20-25 feet in diameter and white in color., It appeared stationary before moving at a high speed southwest., The light oscillated, moving slowly back and forth and up and down., The object later accelerated in a northeast direction and disappeared., No sound was associated with the sighting.
sighted object: a bright, oval-shaped light in the sky
witness description: civilian security officers employed by the Public Service Company of Colorado
